content: Kry/Livi is looking for someone to help us digitialise the European health care system. Kry has quickly grown to become Europe's biggest digital healthcare provider and we are making a bet that using an event driven architecture using FHIR is the way forward for managing our health data. Does this sound interesting? We offer fully remote positions in some European countries. Read more here: https://career.kry.se/jobs/1174112-senior-software-engineer-data
